profile.desc: Invite your friends and earn with TipTop! Get from 1% to 5% from each of their purchases

referralsDetails.title: Earn with TipTop
referralsDetails.desc: Share your referral link, attract new users and earn income from each of their purchases. The more referrals, the higher your earnings!
referralsDetails.advantagesText1: A percentage of each purchase depending on your level
referralsDetails.advantagesText2: No restrictions on using the link
referralsDetails.levelsDesc: Your level is determined by the total number of purchases your referrals make:

withdrawals.title: Withdrawal via Crypto Bot
withdrawals.text2: Important: Only one application can be processed.
withdrawals.text3: Direct crediting via the TON network, no fees!

reviews.desc: You can read our clients' reviews on popular platforms:

content.greetingText: We’re happy to see you in our game privileges store. Here you'll find everything you need to enhance your gaming experience.
content.shopText: Our store offers a wide range of game privileges and items to help you stand out and gain extra advantages in-game.
content.advantage1: Instant delivery of goods after purchase.
content.advantage2: Support for popular payment methods including cryptocurrency.
content.securityText: We guarantee the safety of your data and the confidentiality of all transactions.
content.supportText: If you have questions or issues, you can always contact our support via Telegram.

agreement.title: User Agreement
agreement.intro: This User Agreement governs the relationship between you and our store.
agreement.acceptanceText: By using our store, you agree to the terms of this Agreement.
agreement.servicesText: We provide digital goods and privileges that become available after payment.
agreement.liabilityText: We are not responsible for third-party actions or service interruptions beyond our control.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
privacy.collectText: We may collect minimal data needed to process orders and improve our service.
privacy.useText: Collected data is used solely to fulfill orders and support users.
privacy.securityText: We apply modern security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.
